title: Hickory's Haven
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:scp-trans-pride |trans-pride-animated-header= --] |trans-pride-logo= --] |trans-pride-footer= --]]]
[[module css]]
.entry {background-color: #F2EAE1; color: #21252E; border: solid 2px #F4AB58; width: 88%; padding: 1px 15px; margin: 10px; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.5); margin: auto}
[[/module]]
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]
Hi, I'm Hickory. Thanks for viewing my author page!

I'm an irregular writer with a wide range of interests. My main focus is on writing tales.

Feel free to message me any time if there's anything you need.
----
+ My Articles:
++ Tales
[[div class="entry" style="width: 95%;background-color: #FEFFFF;border: solid 2px #333333"]]
[[module ListPages name="exactly-what-happened"]]
[[[exactly-what-happened|Exactly What Happened to Interdimensional SCP Death Battle Arena-13]]] - (+%%rating%%)
[[/module]]
**Posted:** 29 Aug 2023

**Word Count:** 26,411

**Author's Notes:** Written for Remixcon 2023, this was my first ever contribution to the wiki. I had originally planned to write a relatively short piece as my first article and work from there. Then I had a cool idea.
[[/div]]
@@@@
[[div class="entry" style="width: 95%;background-color: #FEFFFF;border: solid 2px #333333"]]
[[module ListPages name="animal-antics"]]
[[[animal-antics|Animal Antics]]] - (+%%rating%%)
[[/module]]
**Posted:** 28 Dec 2023

**Word Count:** 6,509

**Author's Notes:** This tale was written for December 2023's Art Exchange event and was a gift for [[*user MetalRavioli]], featuring many of her own SCPs. I had a lovely time writing this one. The healing anomaly I invented for this tale being an axolotl was actually a coincidence; I didn't realize MetalRavioli's profile picture was also an axolotl until after I wrote it.
[[/div]]
@@@@

[[div class="entry" style="width: 95%;background-color: #FEFFFF;border: solid 2px #333333"]]
[[module ListPages name="drowning-in-ambition"]]
[[[drowning-in-ambition|Drowning in Ambition]]] - (+%%rating%%)
[[/module]]
**Posted:** 26 Aug 2024

**Word Count:** 765

**Author's Notes:** This is a short tale originally written for a series that was deleted before its posting. It's a mirror of my own struggles with burnout and ambition, and it's something I think turned out very well.
[[/div]]
++ GoI Formats
[[div class="entry" style="width: 95%;background-color: #FEFFFF;border: solid 2px #333333"]]
[[module ListPages name="the-beauty"]]
[[[the-beauty|The Beauty]]] - (+%%rating%%)
[[/module]]
**Posted:** 14 Nov 2023

**Word Count:** 933

**Author's Notes:** This article was a bit experimental. I wanted to try my hand at writing a short-form horror story akin to classic creepypastas in the SCP setting. I remain with mixed feelings about the result, but I'm still glad I wrote it.
[[/div]]
++ Joke Articles
++++ Joke SCPs
[[div class="entry" style="width: 95%;background-color: #FEFFFF;border: solid 2px #333333"]]
[[module ListPages name="scp-0001-j"]]
[[[scp-0001-j|SCP-0001-J - World's Best Boss]]] - (+%%rating%%)
[[/module]]
**Posted:**  19 Sep 2023

**Word Count:** 2,016

**Author's Notes:** This article was co-written with [[*user AwhRyan]]. We wrote this rather spontaneously after he had the initial idea for it while planning a completely different co-written article that never came to fruition. I'm very proud of the mandatory movie night and 'scheduled 682 breach' bit.
[[/div]]
----
+ Collaborative Works I've Contributed To:
[[div class="entry" style="width: 95%;background-color: #FEFFFF;border: solid 2px #333333"]]
[[[log-of-anomalous-items-vol-vi|Log Of Anomalous Items, Vol VI]]]
**Contribution:** Anomalous Item 1256 (The Revolver)

**Date Added:** 28 Aug 2023

**Author's Notes:** Thought the idea was cool, didn't have anywhere further to go with it, slapped it in there.
[[/div]]
----
+ Relevant Offsite Works:
[[div class="entry" style="width: 95%;background-color: #FEFFFF;border: solid 2px #333333"]]
[https://hikarinu.itch.io/stardust I See You in Stardust]

**Published:** 29 Jan 2025

**Author's Notes:** This is a video game I made for Art Exchange 2024. It was a gift for [[*user Daymon Rocker]] (AKA NatCat). This is far from the first game dev project I started, but it is the first one I finished. I learned a lot from its development, most of which was the same lesson I've repeatedly learned and failed to internalize about my own over-ambition. Ultimately, despite how much I rushed to complete it back in December, I'm proud of how it turned out.
[[/div]]

@@ @@

author: Hikarinu
